1.formula: To carry out sensitivity analyses against the base model use the Create New Scenario button. This will create a clone of the base model for you to amend any of the underlying assumptions e.g. changing the monthly licence rental fee (ARPU) etc. The key output metrics for all scenarios generated will be shown in the table below.
